meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Hallie Fox Neha Embar Greg Boscaiu Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6435.

div.div:
2012 Kids Week game 5.
Last game of Season 28.

td.p: Hallie Fox, a 12-year-old from Ypsilanti, Michigan
Neha Embar, a 12-year-old from Alpharetta, Georgia
Greg Boscaiu, a 12-year-old from Brea, California

tr.td: BIRTHDAY PARTY LOCATIONS
SPORTS STARS
AROUND THE WORLD
COMMUNICATION
LET'S PLAY IN THE YARD
KID RHYMES

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'You & your friends can gape at the animals at the Central Park this, where "Madagascar" is set')

tr.td: Greg
Neha

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Greg
Neha
Hallie
CREATURES
KID HEROES
THE 21st CENTURY
THAT'S A MYTH
BOYS IN BALLET
WORD"Z"
(Alex: Notice the "Z" in quotation marks. In fact, each correct response will end with the letter "Z".)
